title: Generalized $XYZ$ Model Associated to Sklyanin Algebra$^*$
abstract: The free energy of a lattice model, which is a generalization of the Heisenberg $XYZ$ model with the higher spin representation of the Sklyanin algebra, is calculated by the generalized Bethe Ansatz of Takhtajan and Faddeev. (Talk given at the XXI Differential Geometry Methods in Theoretical Physics, Tianjin, China 5-9 June 1992)
